leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 化学信息-分子表示与检索生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 表示库 + 向量检索 + index

queries: [WEB] compound library management system open source github

tools.name: rdkit-react
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit-based script for performing chemical reactions on molecules
tools.detailed_description: A Python script utilizing RDKit to perform chemical reactions on molecules, supporting reaction enumeration and library generation tasks.

tools.name: MungeSumstats
tools.one_line_profile: Standardisation and quality control for GWAS/QTL summary statistics
tools.detailed_description: A package to standardise and perform quality control on Genome-Wide Association Study (GWAS) or Quantitative Trait Locus (QTL) summary statistics, enabling cross-study comparisons.

tools.name: Jupyter_Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecular docking protocols and visualization in Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A set of Jupyter Notebooks for performing molecular docking protocols interactively, including visualization, file format conversion, and result analysis.

tools.name: UMI-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for handling Unique Molecular Identifiers in NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for handling Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMIs) in Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) data sets, primarily used for deduplication and error correction.

tools.name: genCRN
tools.one_line_profile: Fast enumeration of non-isomorphic chemical reaction networks
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the fast enumeration of non-isomorphic chemical reaction networks (CRNs), useful in systems chemistry and synthetic biology.

tools.name: peppercornenumerator
tools.one_line_profile: Domain-level nucleic acid reaction enumeration
tools.detailed_description: A library for enumerating domain-level nucleic acid reaction networks, used in DNA computing and molecular programming.

tools.name: UMICollapse
tools.one_line_profile: Fast deduplication for reads with Unique Molecular Identifiers
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accelerating the deduplication and collapsing process for NGS reads with Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMI), optimized for scalability.

tools.name: rdkit-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of RDKit scripts for cheminformatics tasks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts utilizing RDKit for various cheminformatics tasks, serving as utilities for molecular data processing.

tools.name: rdeditor
tools.one_line_profile: Simple RDKit molecule editor GUI
tools.detailed_description: A Graphical User Interface (GUI) for editing molecules using RDKit and PySide, facilitating chemical structure input and modification.

tools.name: scikit-mol
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible molecular vectorization using RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A library providing scikit-learn compatible classes for molecular vectorization and featurization using RDKit, enabling machine learning on chemical data.

tools.name: Molecules_Dataset_Collection
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of molecular datasets for property inference
tools.detailed_description: A repository collecting various datasets of molecules intended for the validation of property inference models in cheminformatics.

tools.name: wagl
tools.one_line_profile: Standardising satellite imagery into Analysis Ready Data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for processing and standardising satellite imagery into Analysis Ready Data (ARD) form, including atmospheric correction.

tools.name: Click
tools.one_line_profile: Preprepared click chemistry reactions for RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A collection of preprepared reaction definitions (SMIRKS/RXN) for performing click chemistry reactions using RDKit.

tools.name: DECL-Gen
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for DNA Encoded Library (DEL) generation and evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for designing combinatorial DNA Encoded Libraries (DEL) in situ and evaluating next-generation sequencing results from library enrichments.

tools.name: VItA
tools.one_line_profile: Virtual ITerative Angiogenesis library for synthetic vasculature generation
tools.detailed_description: A library for generating synthetic vascular networks mimicking the angiogenesis process, supporting in-vivo or experimental prior constraints.

tools.name: standardised-image-reconstruction
tools.one_line_profile: Standardised image reconstruction for photoacoustic imaging
tools.detailed_description: A project providing standardised algorithms and tools for image reconstruction in the field of photoacoustic imaging.

tools.name: InformaticsMatters Pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Containerised components for cheminformatics and computational chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A collection of containerised tools and pipelines for cheminformatics and computational chemistry tasks, facilitating reproducible workflows.

tools.name: psikit
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface combining Psi4 and RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that interfaces Psi4 (quantum chemistry) with RDKit (cheminformatics), enabling seamless quantum chemical calculations on RDKit molecules.

tools.name: reaction_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for chemical reaction datasets and template extraction
tools.detailed_description: A set of utilities for processing chemical reaction datasets, including reaction template extraction and handling, supporting reaction prediction tasks.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for molecular deep learning with RDKit and Pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Keras layers and utilities for building end-to-end deep learning models for molecules and materials, integrating with RDKit and Pymatgen.

tools.name: JISA
tools.one_line_profile: Library for instrument control and experiment automation
tools.detailed_description: A Java library for standardised instrument control, data handling, and GUI creation, designed for creating physics experiment control programs.

tools.name: Papyrus_structure_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for standardising chemical structures for the Papyrus dataset
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing and standardising chemical structures, used to generate the Papyrus dataset, handling stereochemistry, salts, and tautomers.

tools.name: CombBLAS
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed-memory parallel graph library for graph analytics
tools.detailed_description: An extensible distributed-memory parallel graph library offering linear algebra primitives for graph analytics, widely used in scientific computing tasks like genome assembly.

tools.name: ccdutils
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for handling PDB Chemical Component Dictionary definitions
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python tools using RDKit to parse and manipulate PDB chemical component definitions (CCD) for small molecules in structural biology.

tools.name: Free-Wilson
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Free-Wilson SAR analysis method using RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Free-Wilson analysis method for Structure-Activity Relationship (SAR) studies, utilizing RDKit for molecular processing.

tools.name: rd_filters
tools.one_line_profile: Script to filter chemical libraries using structural alerts (PAINS, etc.)
tools.detailed_description: A command-line script and Python package for filtering chemical libraries based on structural alerts (such as PAINS, Glaxo, Dundee) and calculating physicochemical properties using RDKit and ChEMBL data.

tools.name: solubility
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Delaney's ESOL solubility prediction method
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the ESOL (Estimated SOLubility) method for predicting aqueous solubility of organic molecules directly from their structure using RDKit.

tools.name: useful_rdkit_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of helper functions for RDKit-based cheminformatics
tools.detailed_description: A library of utility functions and Jupyter notebook examples for common cheminformatics tasks using RDKit, including visualization, clustering, and property calculation.

tools.name: Kaplan
tools.one_line_profile: Conformer searching and generation package
tools.detailed_description: A package for generating and searching molecular conformers, essential for 3D molecular modeling and simulation tasks.

tools.name: PACKMAN
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for protein structure and dynamics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A structural biology package inspired by OpenBabel, designed for analyzing protein structures and dynamics, including packing analysis and hinge prediction.

tools.name: phsmethods
tools.one_line_profile: Standardised methods for public health data analysis in Scotland
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing standardized functions and methods for analyzing public health data, ensuring consistency in statistical reporting and data processing.

tools.name: RadonPy
tools.one_line_profile: Automated physical property calculation library for polymer informatics
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to automate the calculation of physical properties for polymers, facilitating high-throughput polymer informatics and materials screening.

tools.name: canonicalize_psmiles
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for the canonicalization of Polymer SMILES strings
tools.detailed_description: A tool specifically designed to handle the canonicalization of Polymer SMILES (BigSMILES/CurlySMILES variants), enabling consistent representation and deduplication of polymer structures.

tools.name: NeuralPlayground
tools.one_line_profile: Standardised environment for hippocampus and entorhinal cortex models
tools.detailed_description: A standardized simulation environment and benchmarking framework for comparing models of the hippocampus and entorhinal cortex in neuroscience research.

tools.name: cheminformatics-microservice
tools.one_line_profile: Microservices API for essential cheminformatics operations
tools.detailed_description: A set of microservices providing API access to standard cheminformatics functions (likely based on CDK), enabling integration of chemical data processing into web workflows.

tools.name: SpaceHASTEN
tools.one_line_profile: Structure-based virtual screening tool for non-enumerated libraries
tools.detailed_description: A structure-based virtual screening tool designed to handle non-enumerated virtual chemical libraries, enabling efficient exploration of large chemical spaces.

tools.name: ScaffoldGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Library for generation and analysis of scaffold networks and trees
tools.detailed_description: An open-source cheminformatics library built on RDKit and NetworkX for generating, analyzing, and visualizing scaffold networks and trees to understand chemical space and structure-activity relationships.

tools.name: STDG-evaluation-metrics
tools.one_line_profile: Standardised metrics for synthetic tabular data evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit providing standardized metrics and methods to evaluate the quality and utility of synthetic tabular data, applicable in data science and scientific data augmentation contexts.

tools.name: pact_methodology
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of WBCSD PACT Methodology for Product Carbon Footprints
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the WBCSD PACT Methodology for calculating and standardizing Product Carbon Footprints (PCF), supporting environmental science and sustainability research.

tools.name: moldrug
tools.one_line_profile: Package for drug-oriented optimization in chemical space
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that uses genetic algorithms for drug-oriented molecule optimization, facilitating the exploration of chemical space for drug discovery.

tools.name: openbabel-gem
tools.one_line_profile: Ruby wrapper for the OpenBabel chemistry library
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby Gem providing bindings to the OpenBabel chemistry library, enabling chemical file conversion and processing within Ruby applications.

tools.name: standartox
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for standardising toxicity data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for retrieving, cleaning, and standardizing aquatic toxicity data from various databases, facilitating ecotoxicology research.

tools.name: rdkit_ipynb_tools
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit visualization and analysis tools for IPython Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to enhance the use of RDKit in Jupyter Notebooks, focusing on interactive visualization and data handling for cheminformatics.

tools.name: DeDup
tools.one_line_profile: Merged read deduplication tool for NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based tool for performing deduplication on merged single-end reads in Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, addressing specific biases in ancient DNA or specific library protocols.

tools.name: AWS Ambit Scenario Designer
tools.one_line_profile: Scenario designer for autonomous vehicle and robotics simulation in UE4
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for Unreal Engine 4 to streamline the creation of complex scenarios for autonomous vehicle and robotics simulations, supporting large-scale content generation.

tools.name: MolPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit-based molecular processing pipeline integrated with scikit-learn
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that wraps RDKit functionalities into scikit-learn pipelines, facilitating the automated processing of molecular data for machine learning tasks.

tools.name: mols2grid
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive 2D molecular structure viewer for dataframes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides an interactive interface for viewing and exploring 2D chemical structures within pandas DataFrames or Jupyter notebooks.

tools.name: CDK (Chemistry Development Kit)
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source Java library for structural chemo- and bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Java library for bio- and cheminformatics, providing data structures, algorithms for molecular processing, QSAR descriptors, and format I/O.

tools.name: Chembience
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for chemoinformatics web applications and microservices
tools.detailed_description: A Docker-based platform designed to facilitate the development and deployment of chemoinformatics-centric web applications and microservices.

tools.name: ChEMBL Structure Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Standardization and salt stripping pipeline for chemical structures
tools.detailed_description: The official protocol used by ChEMBL to standardize and clean chemical structures, including salt stripping and canonicalization.

tools.name: ChEMBL Beaker
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit wrapper providing chemical functionalities via REST API
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight web server wrapper around RDKit, exposing chemical informatics functionalities (like format conversion, descriptor calculation) through a RESTful API.

tools.name: ProLIF
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Fingerprints generator
tools.detailed_description: A library to generate interaction fingerprints for protein-ligand complexes from molecular dynamics trajectories or docking poses.

tools.name: rdchiral
tools.one_line_profile: Stereochemistry-aware wrapper for RDKit reaction handling
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper for RDKit's RunReactants function that provides improved handling of stereochemistry and chirality during chemical reaction simulation.

tools.name: Datamol
tools.one_line_profile: High-level molecular processing library built on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a simplified, high-level API for common RDKit operations, aiming to make molecular processing more accessible and pythonic.

tools.name: rdkit-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of command-line cheminformatics scripts using RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A set of standalone Python scripts utilizing RDKit for various cheminformatics tasks such as conformation generation, docking preparation, and molecular property calculation.

tools.name: chemistry_drawer
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for drawing molecules using Plotly
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that leverages Plotly to create interactive 2D visualizations of chemical structures, enabling integration into web applications or notebooks for chemical data presentation.

tools.name: ClusterFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline tool for bioinformatics analyses on clusters
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool designed to automate and standardize bioinformatics analysis pipelines on cluster environments, managing dependencies and job submissions.

tools.name: Standardiser
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular standardisation tool for chemical structures
tools.detailed_description: A tool for standardizing molecular structures, likely handling tasks such as tautomer canonicalization, salt stripping, and format normalization to prepare chemical datasets for modeling.

tools.name: ChemmineOB
tools.one_line_profile: R interface for OpenBabel cheminformatics library
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to the OpenBabel C++ library, enabling chemical file format conversion, substructure searching, and fingerprint calculation within the R environment.

tools.name: ChemLG
tools.one_line_profile: Massive parallel molecular library generator
tools.detailed_description: A smart and massively parallel molecular library generator designed for chemical and materials sciences, capable of generating diverse chemical structures for high-throughput screening.

tools.name: ESP-Sim
tools.one_line_profile: Electrostatic potential and shape similarity scoring
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool using RDKit to calculate and score the similarity of molecules based on 3D shape and Electrostatic Potential (ESP), useful for virtual screening and bioisostere replacement.

tools.name: ClustTraj
tools.one_line_profile: Clustering tool for molecular dynamics trajectories
tools.detailed_description: A Python script that performs agglomerative clustering on molecular dynamics or Monte Carlo trajectories to classify and analyze similar structural conformations.

tools.name: actel
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of acoustic telemetry data
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the standardized analysis of acoustic telemetry data, tracking fish movements through receiver arrays, used in ecological and biological research.

tools.name: POAP
tools.one_line_profile: Parallelized Open Babel & Autodock Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline tool that integrates Open Babel and AutoDock suites to perform parallelized ligand preparation and molecular docking for virtual screening.

tools.name: ugropy
tools.one_line_profile: UNIFAC-like group detection for thermodynamics
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that identifies UNIFAC-like functional groups in molecules from their names or structures, facilitating input generation for thermodynamic models like UNIFAC, PSRK, and Joback.

tools.name: SMILESAugmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Data augmentation for chemical SMILES strings
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for augmenting chemical datasets by generating variations of SMILES, SELFIES, and Reaction SMILES, useful for training machine learning models in chemistry.

tools.name: pySiRC
tools.one_line_profile: Reaction rate constant prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A web application and library for predicting reaction rate constants using machine learning models based on molecular fingerprints.

tools.name: spyn
tools.one_line_profile: SSNMR shield tensor calculation and conformer generation
tools.detailed_description: A software suite for calculating solid-state NMR shield tensors using the GIPAW method, visualizing spectra, and generating conformers using genetic algorithms.

tools.name: xyz2mol
tools.one_line_profile: XYZ coordinates to RDKit molecule converter
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that converts molecular coordinates (XYZ format) into RDKit molecular objects with connectivity and bond order inference, bridging quantum chemistry outputs with cheminformatics.

tools.name: Ambit (Tensor)
tools.one_line_profile: Tensor product calculation library for quantum chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library designed for the efficient implementation of tensor product calculations, primarily used in the development of quantum chemistry software for electronic structure theory.

tools.name: AQME
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Quantum Mechanical Environments workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based workflow tool for automated conformer generation, QM input creation, and post-processing of outputs, integrating RDKit, CREST, and xTB for efficient computational chemistry campaigns.

tools.name: QSAR-ready
tools.one_line_profile: Standardization workflow for QSAR-ready structures
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for pre-treating chemical structures to make them 'QSAR-ready', involving cleaning, standardization, and normalization steps to ensure data quality for modeling.

tools.name: Scopy
tools.one_line_profile: Library for negative design and HTS database filtering
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for filtering chemical databases, focusing on 'negative design' to remove undesirable compounds (e.g., PAINS, frequent hitters) during high-throughput screening or virtual screening campaigns.

tools.name: scikit-chem
tools.one_line_profile: High-level cheminformatics Python package built on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A high level cheminformatics package for the Scientific Python stack, built on RDKit, providing a more pythonic interface for chemical data analysis.

tools.name: PIDGINv3
tools.one_line_profile: Protein target prediction using random forests
tools.detailed_description: Protein target prediction using random forests and reliability-density neighbourhood analysis for bioactivity prediction.

tools.name: eMolFrag
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular fragmentation tool based on BRICS algorithm
tools.detailed_description: eMolFrag is a molecular fragmentation tool based on the BRICS algorithm, useful for decomposing molecules into building blocks for library design.

tools.name: MODIFY
tools.one_line_profile: ML-optimized library design for protein engineering
tools.detailed_description: ML-optimized library design with improved fitness and diversity for protein engineering applications.

tools.name: PoseBusters
tools.one_line_profile: Plausibility checks for generated molecule poses
tools.detailed_description: A tool to perform plausibility checks for generated molecule poses, ensuring physical validity and chemical sanity in docking or generative models.

tools.name: Ambit
tools.one_line_profile: FEniCSx-based cardiovascular multi-physics solver
tools.detailed_description: A FEniCSx-based cardiovascular multi-physics solver for modeling heart mechanics and hemodynamics.

tools.name: Reaction Network
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting inorganic chemical reaction pathways
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for predicting likely inorganic chemical reaction pathways using graph theoretical methods.

tools.name: molecular_rectifier
tools.one_line_profile: Automated correction of unsanitizable RDKit molecules
tools.detailed_description: A tool to correct RDKit molecules that fail sanitization, attempting to fix valence and structure errors automatically.

tools.name: rdkit_to_params
tools.one_line_profile: Generate Rosetta params files from RDKit molecules
tools.detailed_description: Create or modify Rosetta params files (topology files) from scratch, RDKit mols, or another params file, facilitating small molecule usage in Rosetta.

tools.name: MolVS
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule Validation and Standardization
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for the validation and standardization of chemical structures, ensuring consistency in molecular representation.

tools.name: openbabel-node
tools.one_line_profile: OpenBabel Bindings for Node.js
tools.detailed_description: Node.js bindings for the OpenBabel chemical toolbox, enabling cheminformatics operations in JavaScript environments.

tools.name: AMR
tools.one_line_profile: Antimicrobial Resistance data analysis in R
tools.detailed_description: Functions to simplify and standardise antimicrobial resistance (AMR) data analysis and to work with microbial and antimicrobial properties.

tools.name: PALS
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for Analysing Lesions after Stroke
tools.detailed_description: A scalable toolbox designed to facilitate standardised analysis and ensure quality in stroke research using T1-weighted MRIs.

tools.name: ODDT
tools.one_line_profile: Open Drug Discovery Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A modular and comprehensive toolkit for use in cheminformatics, molecular modeling, and drug discovery.

tools.name: Auto-CORPus
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to standardise text and table data from publications
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to standardise text and table data extracted from full text publications, facilitating biomedical text mining.

tools.name: Open Babel
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical toolbox for speaking the many languages of chemical data
tools.detailed_description: A chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of chemical data, facilitating file format conversion and chemical property calculation.

tools.name: PLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Profiler
tools.detailed_description: Analyze and visualize non-covalent protein-ligand interactions in PDB files.

tools.name: RDKit
tools.one_line_profile: Open source cheminformatics and machine learning software
tools.detailed_description: A collection of cheminformatics and machine learning software written in C++ and Python, serving as a core library for molecular representation, manipulation, and analysis.

tools.name: RDKit.js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript distribution of the RDKit cheminformatics functionality
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive cheminformatics and molecule rendering toolkit ported to JavaScript/WebAssembly, enabling chemical intelligence in web applications.

tools.name: chemicalite
tools.one_line_profile: SQLite extension for storing and querying chemical structures
tools.detailed_description: A chemical database extension for SQLite that adds support for molecular data types, substructure search, and chemical descriptors using RDKit.

tools.name: taxpasta
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic Profile Aggregation and Standardisation tool
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool to standardise and aggregate taxonomic profiles generated by various bioinformatics classifiers (e.g., Kraken2, MetaPhlAn) into a single table.

tools.name: NuDup
tools.one_line_profile: PCR duplicate removal tool for NGS data using molecular tags
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to mark and remove duplicate molecules in Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, specifically leveraging molecular tagging technology (UMIs) to distinguish true biological duplicates from PCR artifacts.

tools.name: DataWarrior
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive data analysis and visualization software for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive desktop application for data visualization and analysis with embedded chemical intelligence, supporting structure-activity relationship (SAR) analysis, library design, and property prediction.

tools.name: Pharmacophore Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for generating pharmacophore models from molecular data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and scripts based on RDKit to generate, visualize, and analyze pharmacophore models for drug discovery applications.

tools.name: molplotly
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecule visualization add-on for Plotly
tools.detailed_description: A Python library built on top of Plotly that enables interactive visualization of chemical structures within scatter plots when hovering over data points.

tools.name: RDMC
tools.one_line_profile: Package for handling reaction data and molecular conformers
tools.detailed_description: Reaction Data and Molecular Conformers (RDMC) is a Python package designed to handle chemical reactions, molecules, and their 3D conformers, facilitating complex computational chemistry workflows.

tools.name: StdToolheadOpenfoam
tools.one_line_profile: Standardised CFD workflow for 3D printer toolhead analysis
tools.detailed_description: A standardized computational fluid dynamics (CFD) workflow based on OpenFOAM for analyzing the airflow and thermal properties of 3D printer toolheads.
